metadata.title: Roadmap - Scalar
metadata.description: Track our progress and upcoming features.

roadmapItems.title: Live preview editing
roadmapItems.description: Let content editors preview their changes in real-time within the CMS editor.

roadmapItems.title: SvelteKit plugin
roadmapItems.description: First-class Scalar support for SvelteKit via a plugin.

roadmapItems.title: API tokens with granular scopes
roadmapItems.description: Create multiple tokens with read/write/scope-level permissions for teams and external services.

roadmapItems.title: Image editor field type
roadmapItems.description: Add support for cropping, aspect ratios, alt-text, and focal point control in media uploads.

roadmapItems.title: Code-first schema sync
roadmapItems.description: Use TypeScript or JSON schema files to define content structure, sync to the UI automatically.

roadmapItems.title: GitHub integration (beta)
roadmapItems.description: Push/pull content and schema changes via GitHub. Ideal for content versioning and CI workflows.

roadmapItems.title: Full-text search API
roadmapItems.description: A robust, built-in full-text search endpoint for your content — supports filters, relevance scoring, and language-aware stemming.

roadmapItems.title: Custom field components
roadmapItems.description: Support for embedding custom React/Vue/Svelte components as field editors — perfect for things like color pickers, map selectors, or signature pads.
